text:
For the beach, I have a couple of the big suitcases. I have two hanging garmet bags.  Will also bring some boxes but I think I left some as well. Not sure
if we need some big trash bags but if you have, bring.
Note that I am waiting for a spot to charge so I can get back and forth today. I will be underground of course with no cell or WiFi. But promise to
check once I’m out of the cave and head to Sbux in my way.
Thanks for the cooperation! I’ll be sure not to contribute to the mistakes made yesterday.
Message 587 of 4024
Noted the email. I have my coffee but thank you.
I’ll have him there early.
Sent:01/20/2024 at 12:12 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/20/2024 at 12:15 PM)
Subject:Re: I’ll check OFW so no misunderstandings
Message 588 of 4024
Ok. But this will be hot???
Don’t forget a water bottle.
I’ll see you in 30 minutes
Sent:01/20/2024 at 12:16 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/20/2024 at 12:26 PM)
Subject:Re: I’ll check OFW so no misunderstandings
Message 589 of 4024
Well... you made the right call... I’ve been standing here almost since I ordered... my drink is still nowhere in sight. 20 minutes is way to long to pull a
shot and add hot water.
Sent:01/20/2024 at 12:38 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/20/2024 at 12:44 PM)
Subject:Re: I’ll check OFW so no misunderstandings
Message 590 of 4024
We have discussed plans all week. We even made good progress. Now at the time we are supposed to go finish you bail with zero warning.
Then I propose to do a Lugg to satisfy you at my expense. To move the complete black box of stuff you insisted on pulling out whether I need it or
not.
If you think you can be depended on for any commitment at all, just take a moment and reflect on last night and the plans we had for today.
Sent:01/20/2024 at 02:02 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/20/2024 at 02:03 PM)
Subject:Zero Progress
